title: 从零开始撸框架(2)-项目龙骨
slug: 从零开始撸框架(2)-项目龙骨
path: api/articles/从零开始撸框架(2)-项目龙骨.json
content:
项目结构

上文说到框架包含Ioc、Di、Orm、Cache等功能,其中只有前两者为核心功能.那么结构上可以采用分包结构开发,即分为核心、组件等功能包,如下.

  • org.btr.ygo.core 核心包,包含了框架ioc、di功能,为其他组件提供支持.
  • org.btr.ygo.tp tp意为(third-party),可以将数据库、缓存等需要引入第三方jar的功能放到这.
  • org.btr.ygo.web web功能

接下来我们先完成core核心包的功能开发.

工厂

说到核心Ioc、Di自然离不开工厂模式.我们先准备写工厂会用到的jar

build.gradle

dependencies {
  // 高性能反射
  compile "com.esotericsoftware:reflectasm:1.11.9"
  // vertx核心jar
  compile "io.vertx:vertx-core:$vertxVersion"
}

辅助类

类工厂会经常用到反射,我们需要写几个类来辅助工厂实现.

函数类,这里会存放以后会用到的各种函数式方法.
EnsureSuppliver.java

package org.btr.ygo.core.funtions;

/**
 * java8的异常版本
 * @see java.util.function.Supplier
 * @author <a href="mailto:1159930219@qq.com">BornToRain</a>
 */
@FunctionalInterface
public interface EnsureSuppliver<T> {
  T get() throws Exception;
}

EnsureExec.java

package org.btr.ygo.core.funtions;

/**
 * java8的异常版本
 * @see java.util.function.Consumer
 * @author <a href="mailto:1159930219@qq.com">BornToRain</a>
 */
@FunctionalInterface
public interface EnsureExec {
  void exec() throws Exception;
}

Fn.java

package org.btr.ygo.core.kit;

import lombok.extern.log4j.Log4j2;
import org.btr.ygo.core.funtions.EnsureExec;
import org.btr.ygo.core.funtions.EnsureSuppliver;

import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Objects;
import java.util.function.Supplier;

/**
 * 函数类,封装了条件分支以及非空判断.
 * @author <a href="mailto:1159930219@qq.com">BornToRain</a>
 */
@Log4j2
public final class Fn {
  // 连接池函数,优先使用key在池中找可用value,找不到才会通过Supplier去创建一个value.
  public static <K, V> V pool(Map<K, V> map, K key, Supplier<V> fn) {
    V value = map.get(key);
    if (Objects.isNull(value)) {
      value = fn.get();
      map.put(key, value);
    }
    return value;
  }
  public static <T> T ensureRun(EnsureSuppliver<T> fn, Object... args) {
    return ensureRun(null, fn, args);
  }
  public static <T> T ensureRun(T defaultValue, EnsureSuppliver<T> fn, Object... args) {
    T ret = null;
    try {
      if (Arrays.stream(args).allMatch(Objects::nonNull)) ret = fn.get();
    } catch (Exception e) {
      e.printStackTrace();
    } finally {
      if (Objects.isNull(ret)) ret = defaultValue;
    }
    return ret;
  }
  public static <T> T ensureRun(boolean condition, EnsureSuppliver<T> fn1, EnsureSuppliver<T> fn2) {
    T ret = null;
    try {
      if (condition) {
        if (Objects.nonNull(fn1)) ret = fn1.get();
      }
      else {
        if (Objects.nonNull(fn2)) ret = fn2.get();
      }
    } catch (Exception e) {
      e.printStackTrace();
    }
    return ret;
  }
  public static void ensureExec(EnsureExec fun, Object... args) {
    try {
      if (Arrays.stream(args).allMatch(Objects::nonNull)) fun.exec();
    } catch (Exception ex) {
      ex.printStackTrace();
    }
  }
}

反射类,有关反射的方法都放在这.
Reflect.java

package org.btr.ygo.core.kit;

import com.esotericsoftware.reflectasm.ConstructorAccess;
import lombok.extern.log4j.Log4j2;
import lombok.val;

import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

/**
 * @author <a href="mailto:1159930219@qq.com">BornToRain</a>
 */
@Log4j2
@SuppressWarnings("all")
public final class Reflect {
  // reflectasm开销主要在于对象的获取,我们把它存起来.
  private static final Map<Class<?>, ConstructorAccess> CONSTRUCTORS = new HashMap<>();
  public static <T> T constructor(Class<?> cls, Object... args) {
    T ret = null;
    try {
      val constructors = cls.getDeclaredConstructors();
      // 拿到类的所有构造函数,我们根据参数来判断选用何种方式创建对象.
      // 优先使用无参,这样能调用到reflectasm.
      // 无参不满足就只能走Java原生了.
      for (Constructor<?> constructor : constructors) {
        val size = args.length;
        if (0 == size) ret = noArgConstructor(cls);
        else if (size != constructor.getParameterTypes().length) continue;
        ret = (T) constructor.newInstance(args);
      }
      return ret;
    } catch (Exception e) {
      e.printStackTrace();
      return ret;
    }
  }
  // 这里用到了reflectasm高性能反射,缺点就是仅支持无参.
  public static <T> T noArgConstructor(Class<?> cls) {
    val access = Fn.pool(CONSTRUCTORS, cls, () -> ConstructorAccess.get(cls));
    return (T) access.newInstance();
  }
}

本体

Trunk.java

package org.btr.ygo.core.kit;

import lombok.extern.log4j.Log4j2;

import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

/**
 * @author <a href="mailto:1159930219@qq.com">BornToRain</a>
 */
@Log4j2
@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
public final class Trunk {
  // 单例存储所有类对象
  private static final Map<String, Object> SINGLETON = new HashMap<>();
  // 所有扫描的类
  public static final Set<Class<?>> CLASSES = new HashSet<>();
  // 单例,优先读map对象,无则懒加载获取实例并存入map.
  public static <T> T singleton(Class<?> cls, Object... args) {
    return (T) Fn.pool(SINGLETON, cls.getName(), () -> instance(cls, args));
  }
  // 实例,每调用一次产生一例.
  public static <T> T instance(Class<?> cls, Object... args) {
    return Fn
      .ensureRun(0 == args.length, () -> Reflect.noArgConstructor(cls), () -> Reflect.constructor(cls, args));
  }
}

测试

TrunkTest.java

package org.btr.ygo.core.kit;

import lombok.extern.log4j.Log4j2;
import lombok.val;
import org.btr.ygo.core.TestApi;
import org.junit.Assert;
import org.junit.Test;

/**
 * @author <a href="mailto:1159930219@qq.com">BornToRain</a>
 */
@Log4j2
public class TrunkTest {
  @Test
  public void testInstance() {
    val i1 = Trunk.instance(TestApi.class);
    val i2 = Trunk.instance(TestApi.class);
    log.info("i1: {}, i2: {}", i1, i2);
    Assert.assertNotEquals(i1, i2);
  }
  @Test
  public void testSingleton() {
    val i1 = Trunk.singleton(TestApi.class);
    val i2 = Trunk.singleton(TestApi.class);
    log.info("i1: {}, i2: {}", i1, i2);
    Assert.assertEquals(i1, i2);
  }
}

测试结果

类扫描加载

Bean管理工厂有了接下来我们来实现类的扫描加载.

辅助类

由于包比较多,我们可以一包一线程的方式进行扫描,加速类的扫描.
PackageThread.java

package org.btr.ygo.core.kit;

import lombok.val;

import java.io.File;
import java.net.JarURLConnection;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLDecoder;
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
import java.util.HashSet;
import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
import java.util.Objects;
import java.util.Set;
import java.util.function.Predicate;
import java.util.stream.Collectors;

/**
 * 包扫描线程,一包一线程.
 * @author <a href="mailto:1159930219@qq.com">BornToRain</a>
 */
public final class PackageThread extends Thread {
  public final String name;
  Set<Class<?>> classes = new HashSet<>();
  public PackageThread(String name) {
    setName("ygo-package-scanner-" + getId());
    this.name = name;
  }
  @Override
  public void run() {
    classes.addAll(getClasses(null, name));
  }
  public Set<Class<?>> getClasses(Predicate<Class<?>> filter, String name) {
    val classes = new LinkedHashSet<Class<?>>();
    boolean recursive = true;
    // a.b.c -> a/b/c
    val pkgDir = name.replace('.', '/');
    Fn.ensureExec(() -> {
      val dirs = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().getResources(pkgDir);
      while (dirs.hasMoreElements()) {
        val url = dirs.nextElement();
        val protocol = url.getProtocol();
        if ("file".equals(protocol)) {
          val path = URLDecoder.decode(url.getFile(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
          findAndAdd(pkgDir, path, classes);
        }
        else if ("jar".equals(protocol))
          classes.addAll(getJarClasses(pkgDir, name, url, recursive));
      }
    });
    return null == filter ? classes : classes.stream().filter(filter).collect(Collectors.toSet());
  }
  private Set<Class<?>> getJarClasses(String pkgDir, String name, URL url,
    boolean recursive) {
    val classes = new LinkedHashSet<Class<?>>();
    Fn.ensureRun(() -> {
      // 去掉第一个.
      var pkgPath = (name.startsWith(".")) ? name.substring(1) : name;
      val jar = ((JarURLConnection) url.openConnection()).getJarFile();
      val entries = jar.entries();
      while (entries.hasMoreElements()) {
        val entry = entries.nextElement();
        var entryName = entry.getName();
        // 去掉第一个/
        if (entryName.charAt(0) == '/') entryName = entryName.substring(1);
        if (entryName.startsWith(pkgDir)) {
          val idx = entryName.lastIndexOf('/');
          // entryName存在/说明是package
          // java/lang -> java.lang
          if (idx != -1) pkgPath = entryName.substring(0, idx).replace('/', '.');
          if ((idx != -1) || recursive) {
            // class文件
            if (entryName.endsWith(".class") && !entry.isDirectory()) {
              // 提取class文件名
              val clsName =
                entryName
                  .substring(pkgPath.length() + 1, entryName.lastIndexOf(".class"));
              classes.add(Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader()
                .loadClass(pkgPath + '.' + clsName));
            }
          }
        }
      }
      return null;
    }, pkgDir, name, url);
    return classes;
  }
  private void findAndAdd(String pkgDir, String path, Set<Class<?>> classes) {
    Fn.ensureExec(() -> {
      val file = new File(path);
      if (!file.exists() || !file.isDirectory()) return;
      val classFiles =
        file.listFiles(pathname -> (file.isDirectory()) || file.getName().endsWith(".class"));
      if (Objects.isNull(classFiles)) return;
      // 去掉第一个.
      val pkgPath = (pkgDir.startsWith(".")) ? pkgDir.substring(1) : pkgDir;
      // 是否存在另一个文件夹
      val processedName = pkgPath.replace('/', '.');
      for (File cls : classFiles) {
        // 目录直接跳过
        if (cls.isDirectory())
          findAndAdd(processedName + '.' + cls.getName(), cls.getAbsolutePath(),
            classes);
        else {
          val clsName = cls.getName();
          val name = clsName.substring(0, clsName.lastIndexOf(".class"));
          classes.add(Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader()
            .loadClass(processedName + '.' + name));
        }
      }
    }, pkgDir, path);
  }
}

本体

Packages.java

package org.btr.ygo.core.kit;

import lombok.extern.log4j.Log4j2;
import lombok.val;
import org.btr.ygo.core.constant.Console;

import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.HashSet;
import java.util.Set;
import java.util.stream.Collectors;

/**
 * @author <a href="mailto:1159930219@qq.com">BornToRain</a>
 */
@Log4j2
public final class Packages {
  // 忽略不扫描的包
  private static final Set<String> IGNORE_PACKAGES = Set.of(
    "ch.qos.logback",
    "io.vertx.core",
    "io.netty",
    "com.fasterxml.jackson",
    "com.esotericsoftware",
    "java",
    "javax",
    "jdk",
    "sun",
    "groovy",
    "org.graalvm",
    "org.apache",
    "org.jboss",
    "com.sun",
    "org.slf4j",
    "org.yaml",
    "org.junit",
    "org.apache.logging.log4j"
  );
  public static Set<Class<?>> scan() {
    if (Trunk.CLASSES.isEmpty()) {
      val classes = scan(getPackages().toArray(new String[]{}));
      Trunk.CLASSES.addAll(classes);
      log.info(Console.SCANNED, "Class", classes.size());
    }
    return Trunk.CLASSES;
  }
  private static Set<String> getPackages() {
    val pkgs = Arrays.stream(Package.getPackages())
      .map(Package::getName)
      .filter(name -> IGNORE_PACKAGES.stream().noneMatch(name::startsWith))
      .collect(Collectors.toSet());
    log.info(Console.SCANNED, "Package", pkgs.size());
    return pkgs;
  }
  // 多线程扫描
  private static HashSet<Class<?>> scan(String[] dirs) {
    val threads = Arrays.stream(dirs).map(PackageThread::new).collect(Collectors.toSet());
    threads.forEach(Thread::start);
    val ret = new HashSet<Class<?>>();
    try {
      // 主线程等待子线程全部扫描完毕
      for (PackageThread thread : threads) thread.join();
      // 将所有线程值合并
      for (PackageThread thread : threads) ret.addAll(thread.classes);
    } catch (Exception ex) {
      ex.printStackTrace();
    }
    return ret;
  }
}

测试

PackageTest.java

package org.btr.ygo.core.kit;

import lombok.val;
import org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers;
import org.junit.Assert;
import org.junit.Test;

/**
 * @author <a href="mailto:1159930219@qq.com">BornToRain</a>
 */
public class PackagesTest {
  @Test
  public void test() {
    val classes = Packages.scan();
    Assert.assertThat(classes, CoreMatchers.hasItem(Packages.class));
  }
}

测试结果

总结

这一章我们完成了核心模块的龙骨搭建,让它拥有了两个最原始的功能,即工厂和类集合,有了这俩我们才能开发其他的组件.
